Prepares for either competitive match or recovery session

tennis_training.title: Match Performance or Recovery Activity
tennis_training.description: Competition-level match play or active recovery implementation

phases.name: Pre-Match Preparation
detailed_instructions: Structured warm-up with progressive intensity
General movement: 5 minutes light jogging and dynamic stretching
Sport-specific movement: 5 minutes shadow strokes and footwork
Progressive tennis: 5-10 minutes mini tennis to serving
Mental preparation: 2-3 minutes game plan and visualization

phases.name: Match Performance
detailed_instructions: Maintain high competitive intensity throughout
Execute tactical game plan with adaptability
Focus on energy management for full match duration
Apply all technical and physical training from the week

phases.name: Post-Match Protocol
detailed_instructions: Cool-down walk and light movement
Immediate hydration and nutrition consideration
Initial mental processing of match performance

phases.name: Zone-2 Aerobic Recovery
detailed_instructions: Easy aerobic jog at conversational pace
Maintain 60-70% maximum heart rate
Focus on nasal breathing if possible
Sustainable rhythm throughout duration

phases.name: Dynamic Mobility Session
detailed_instructions: Lower body mobility: leg swings, hip circles, walking lunges
Upper body mobility: arm circles, shoulder rolls, cross-body swings
Core and spine: torso twists, side bends, cat-cow movements
Target any tight areas identified from the week

attribution.validation: Match preparation and recovery preparation standards

exercises.name: Universal Joint Mobility
exercises.protocol: Basic joint preparation for either option
exercises.tennis_application: Prepares joints for movement regardless of intensity

exercises.name: Mental Preparation
exercises.tennis_application: Prepares mind for chosen activity focus

strength_training.title: Option-Specific Activity Implementation
strength_training.description: Competition performance or structured recovery activities

attribution.validation: Professional tennis competition and recovery standards

main_exercises.name: Option A: Match Performance
main_exercises.protocol: Full competitive match with maximum effort
main_exercises.tennis_application: Direct application of all training in competitive environment

technique_points.instruction: Execute structured warm-up with progressive intensity build
Maintain maximum effort and focus throughout match
Apply game plan while adapting to opponent and conditions
Manage intensity for full match duration
Apply all technical work from training week
Maintain focus and composure under pressure
Track performance metrics for post-match analysis
Maintain conversational pace throughout duration
Stay in 60-70% maximum heart rate range
Nasal breathing emphasis for recovery adaptation
Focus on easy, sustainable rhythm
Promote recovery, not additional training stress
Should feel refreshed, not fatigued after session
Support recovery from high-intensity training week

main_exercises.name: Option B: Dynamic Mobility Work
main_exercises.tennis_application: Address movement restrictions from training week

technique_points.instruction: Focus on smooth, controlled movements throughout range
Gradually increase range of motion within comfort
Address major joints used in tennis (hips, shoulders, spine)
Spend extra time on areas that feel restricted
Coordinate breathing with movement patterns
Promote movement quality, not strength development
Address any restrictions developed during training week

circuit_structure.name: Option A: Post-Match Transition
circuit_structure.protocol: Transition from competition to recovery mode

execution_points.instruction: Light walking and easy movement to gradually reduce intensity
Immediate fluid replacement and electrolyte consideration
Initial match review and emotional processing
Begin transition to recovery mode for next day preparation
Gradually reduce activity intensity to stillness
Assess how body feels after recovery session
Maintain hydration throughout and after session
Should feel refreshed and ready for tomorrow
Consider overall week and preparation for next week

recovery_protocol.title: Option-Specific Recovery Protocol
recovery_protocol.description: Recovery approach tailored to activity demands

implementation.method: Thorough cool-down stretching with extended holds
implementation.focus: Lower and upper body emphasis with core/back integration
implementation.progression: From light movement to deep static stretching

implementation.method: Hold stretches 30-60 seconds each with deep breathing
implementation.focus: Hip flexors, hamstrings, calves, shoulders, chest, core
Maintain relaxed state achieved during recovery session

components.name: Universal Recovery Elements
components.protocol: Recovery elements applicable to both options

implementation.method: Hydration, self-assessment, and planning for next day
implementation.focus: Optimal preparation for Sunday and next week
implementation.progression: Complete session integration and forward planning
